Description: Settings for the server can be configured in 'SCUM/Saved/Config/WindowsServer/ServerSettings.ini', or in-game by admins

**Admin and user lists must be edited directly in the config files:**

- **Admin Users:** `SCUM/Saved/Config/WindowsServer/AdminUsers.ini`
- **Server Settings Admins:** `SCUM/Saved/Config/WindowsServer/ServerSettingsAdminUsers.ini`
- **Whitelist (Exclusive Join):** `SCUM/Saved/Config/WindowsServer/ExclusiveUsers.ini`
- **Reserved Slots (VIP):** `SCUM/Saved/Config/WindowsServer/WhitelistedUsers.ini`

Add one [Steam64 ID](https://steamid.io/) per line. For admin permissions, use format: `76561198012345678[SetGodMode,RestartServer]`
Sets the maximum number of players that may connect to the server at one time
If set, BattlEye anti-cheat will be disabled on the server
Additional command line arguments to pass to the SCUM server. For example: -fileopenlog or -MULTIHOME=0.0.0.0. Separate multiple arguments with spaces. **Requires server restart to take effect**
Sets the Proton GE [release version](https://github.com/GloriousEggroll/proton-ge-custom/releases) to install. Empty = latest. Example: GE-Proton9-1
